author: Gonzalo ‘Chalo’ Marin
description: Gonzalo Marin says of his drink, “Asere - a Cuban expression meaning friendship, camaraderie, and bonding - is a cocktail that is powerful enough to convey all of these emotions.  My cocktail reflects the essence of this industry and what it is to imbibe: the art of celebration.“The cocktail seeks to highlight the wood-aged BACARDÍ ‘Ocho’ rum with an aroma of Oloroso sherry, bringing a hint of acidity from the balsamic vinegar and the aftertaste of fresh coffee.”
name: Asere

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over an ice ball
